name: The CR7 NFT Collection: Christiano Ronaldo

metadata.name: CR7 Official NFT #1
metadata.description: Cristiano Ronaldo is the greatest footballer of his generation. He has won 32 trophies throughout his career, including seven league titles, five UEFA Champions Leagues, and the UEFA European Championship. With over 800 official senior goals to his name, he is the top goalscorer in the modern era and has inspired millions of fans across the world.
